examples: The noise drowned out her speech

definitions.text: get rid of as if by submerging
examples: She drowned her trouble in alcohol

definitions.text: die from being submerged in water, getting water into the lungs, and asphyxiating
examples: The child drowned in the lake

definitions.text: be covered with or submerged in a liquid
examples: the meat was swimming in a fatty gravy
